text: Daniel Passent (28 April 1938 â€“ 14 February 2022) was a Polish journalist, politician and writer. He was the author of the En passant blog, which was appearing as a column in a Polish weekly Polityka. Passent was born in modern- day Ivano-Frankivsk, Ukraine. Passent was the Ambassador of Chile from 1997 until 2002. Passent died on 14 February 2022, at the age of 83. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Polish journalists Category:Ambassadors of Poland
title: Daniel Passent
